originalText.text: My son loves his teachers. They are very kind to him and I appreciate that they update me on everything. They provide the children with a safe space. They are very welcoming and my son excels every day because of all the educational activities they make the children do.

originalText.text: We absolutely love this daycare! It was a good sign when we dropped our babies off for their first day and my daughter went with Mariela without crying! Mariela and the other 2 ladies are very loving and caring with my children and Mariela always receives them with a big smile and happy to see them, and as a mom that gives me so much peace to know that my babies are loved and cared for. Very thankful to Dani for being so patient, understanding and kind as a first time parent leaving my kids at daycare. You won‚Äôt regret putting your children in their hands.
